name: Full Year Subscription (2013) 3 issues
description:
Subscribe for a full year to the iamcreole Magazine, we will be putting out 3 more issues this upcoming year (2013). Subscribe today at just $ and get the best in Spiritual, Cultural, Entertainment, and Social content about the Louisiana Creole & Cajun culture nationally. 

Our Magazine Motto:

"Faith. Heritage. Culture."


Email: iamcreolemagazine@gmail.com for questions or concerns

name: Fall/Winter Issue of the Magazine (Digital Version Only)
description:
Order the Fall/Winter Issue of the magazine (digital version)
-----------------------------
Learn about the New Orleans activist, Samuel Cook, Lafayette's Hottest DJ: DJ HOT, the Creole Language of Pointe Coupee, LA, and about the Chicago Creole Family Reunion and a Cajun Christmas Story from Southeast Louisiana and so much more!

---------------------------------
Your digital issue will come as an email within 2-5 business days after your purchase, please USE THE EMAIL via paypal that you want to receive it in, or otherwise specify it (via checkout)!

name: iamcreole Magazine (Spring 2012)
description:
The only hard print Cajun/Creole Publication is now available for purchase. 

The Spring edition of the iamcreole Magazine will be mailing out nationally this March! The cover feature is of Horace Trahan a Zydeco/Cajun music legend.

We also have stories about Créole Hollywood Fashion Designer, Lorielle Broussard, and about 4 women making a differences in their communities (Shannon Boutté, Tracey Colson, Donna Arcenaux, and Arianne Deriuse), and we have some of the best photos of New Orleans & Acadiana and more!!!!

Be sure to purchase your copy now and subscribe by emailing iamcreolemagazine@gmail.com

name: Summer 2012 issue (Digital Version)
description: Read about upcoming artist Amy LaCour, the identy behind a blue eyed-blonde Creole girl in California, try a great Jambalayaa recipe and so much more....!!!!
